effect.x_y: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages. stomp and steamroller have double power against Pokémon that have used this move since entering the field.

short_effect.x_y: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Raises the user’s evasion by two stages.

flavor_text.x_y: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.
